Expected result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.
The Ether balance is shown on the overview. The wallet address is shown on the overview. The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.

Test steps: Keep Ethereum Mainnet as the selected network.
Select or import an account with a token balance.
Notes: Please request access to this test account from George Balolong (Business Operations).

Test steps: Switch back to the tokens list.
Expected result: A prompt is shown to Import tokens found in the account.
Notes: Note that token detection takes place on Ethereum Mainnet regardless of whether this setting is on or off.

Test steps: Select the tokens to import or import all.
Expected result: The tokens list is updated with all imported tokens.

Test steps: Switch to a network other than Ethereum Mainnet.
Notes: Note that token autodetection is currently available on: Ethereum Mainnet, Avalanche, BNB Smart Chain, Polygon, Aurora and Linea Mainnet.

Preconditions: Make sure the autodetect tokens toggle is OFF in Settings.
Expected result: No prompt to Import tokens is shown.

Test steps: Go back to the Tokens list and Refresh list.
Expected result: A prompt is shown to Import tokens found in the account.

Test steps: Select the tokens to import or import all.
Expected result: The tokens list is updated with all imported tokens.
